mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `USER` ( ID, NAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, USER_NAME, PHONE, IS_DELETED, ROW_VERSION, CREATION_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME ) values ( #{request.id}, #{request.name}, #{request.password}, #{request.email}, #{request.userName}, #{request.phone}, 0, 0, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `USER` WHERE IS_DELETED = 0 AND (USER_NAME = #{request.userName} OR PHONE = #{request.phone})
